channel.title: logic_playerproxy Entity Is Broken
channel.description:
The logic_playerproxy entity is completely broken, as reported in [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/28260-logic-playerproxy-broken-in-BM-2015/']this thread[/url]. I'm including a bug report thread here since it's a bug, and I feel like I should more formally report it in the bug report forum.
Although this issue does not appear to cause any noticeable problems in the stock maps, it is a huge hindrance to anyone who needs the functionality of logic_playerproxy in any custom map.
[b]To reproduce:[/b] Make a map with logic_playerproxy and an ambient_generic in it (let's call it "amb") and rig an output: [b]PlayerDied => amb, PlaySound[/b]. Run the map and type "kill" in the console.
[b]Expected results:[/b] You die, and the ambient_generic should play a sound.
[b]Actual results:[/b] You die, and nothing else happens.
So far I've verified this issue with the PlayerDied, OnFlashlightOn, OnFlashlightOff, and SetDamageFilter inputs/outputs.
